com.aylanetworks.aylasdk

类 AylaDeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaDeviceManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AylaConnectivity.AylaConnectivityListener

    public class AylaDeviceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AylaConnectivity.AylaConnectivityListener
    AylaDeviceManager is responsible for maintaining the list of devices from the Ayla cloud service. It will poll for updates to the list of devices, and will notify listeners if the list changes.

    After sign-in, the AylaSessionManager that was created as the result of a successful sign-in operation will contain an AylaDeviceManager object for the session. This may be accessed via the AylaSessionManager.getDeviceManager() method.

    Application developers will usually register a AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerListener with AylaDeviceManager as soon as the user has signed in and the AylaSessionManager was created.

    Once a listener has been registered, applications should wait for the .aylasdk.AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerListener#deviceManagerInitComplete method to be called, which indicates the AylaDeviceManager has successfully fetched the list of devices and their properties, LAN configuration information, etc. At that point, the list of devices may be obtained via getDevices(), and each AylaDevice object may be interacted with.

    If the AylaDeviceManager cannot retrieve the device list or encounters unrecoverable errors during intialization, the listeners' AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerListener.deviceManagerInitFailure(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.AylaError, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerState) method will instead be called with the specific AylaError that was encountered as well as the AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerState the manager was in when the error occurred.

    • 嵌套类概要

      static interface  AylaDeviceManager.DeviceManagerListener
      The DeviceManagerListener interface is used to provide notifications of changes to the AylaDeviceManager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDevices

        public java.util.List<AylaDevice> getDevices()
        Returns the current list of devices. The returned list is a copy and may be sorted or modified by the caller.
        返回:
        A list of AylaDevices known to the DeviceManager.

      • getDevices

        public java.util.List<AylaDevice> getDevices(com.android.internal.util.Predicate<AylaDevice> predicate)
        Returns the current list of devices filtered with the specified predicate.
        参数:
        predicate - Predicate determining whether or not to return the device in the list
        返回:
        List of devices filtered with the given predicate

      • getGateways

        public java.util.List<AylaDeviceGateway> getGateways()
        Returns a list of all gateways registered to the account
        返回:
        A list of all gateways registered to the account

      • getSessionManager

        public AylaSessionManager getSessionManager()
        返回:
        the SessionManager that owns this object

        返回:

      • deviceWithDSN

        public AylaDevice deviceWithDSN(java.lang.String dsn)
        Returns the managed AylaDevice object with the given DSN, or null if no device was found.
        参数:
        dsn - The DSN of the device to retrieve
        返回:
        The AylaDevice with the given DSN, or null if not found

      • deviceWithLanIP

        public AylaDevice deviceWithLanIP(java.lang.String lanIP)
        Returns the managed AylaDevice object with the given LAN IP address, nor null if no device was found.

        Since it is possible to have multiple devices with the same IP address, for example on different networks, or devices that are shared with this account, this method will return an AylaDevice only if exactly one device owned by this account (not shared with this account) has the specified IP address. Otherwise null will be returned.

        This means that devices shared with this account cannot be returned from this method, and therefore cannot enter LAN mode.

        参数:
        lanIP - The LAN IP address as a dotted string
        返回:
        The AylaDevice with the given IP address, or null if not found

      • fetchDevices

        public void fetchDevices()
        Fetches the list of devices from the server and merges them into our set. Listeners will be notified if the device list changes as a result of this operation.

        Generally this method does not need to be called by the application; the DeviceManager will automatically keep this list up-to-date by polling the service and notify all listeners of any changes that occur.

      • startPolling

        public void startPolling()
        Starts polling operations. This includes polling of the device service for updates to the device list as well as polling each device's properties for changes.

        Devices that are not allowed to poll (isPollingPermitted() returns false) or devices that are already in LAN mode will not start polling as a result of this operation.

      • stopPolling

        public void stopPolling()
        Stops polling operations. Any devices that are polling will be stopped, and the DeviceManager will stop polling for device list changes.

      • isPolling

        public boolean isPolling()
        返回:
        true if the DeviceManager is polling for device list changes

      • getPollInterval

        public int getPollInterval()
        返回:
        the time in milliseconds between polls of the service for the list of devices registered to the active account

      • setPollInterval

        public void setPollInterval(int timeMs)
        Sets the poll interval to the specified time in milliseconds. If polling is currently active, this will cause an immediate fetch of the device list. Subsequent fetches will happen after the specified time period.
        参数:
        timeMs - Time in milliseconds between calls to fetch the device list while polling

      • getLANServerIP

        public java.lang.String getLANServerIP()
        Returns the IP address of the LAN server. This is the mobile device's WiFi IP address.
        返回:
        the IP address of the LAN server

      • getLANServerPort

        public int getLANServerPort()
        Returns the port the LAN server is listening on
        返回:
        the port the LAN server is listening on, or 0 if the LAN server is not running

      • getLanServer

        public AylaHttpServer getLanServer()

      • hasInitialized

        public boolean hasInitialized()
        Returns true if the DeviceManager has successfully completed the initialization process at least once. If this returns true, a call to getDevices() will return a list of devices that was at one point fetched from the service, regardless of the current state of the DeviceManager. If this returns false, no device list was able to be fetched from the service since DeviceManager was created.
        返回:
        true if DeviceManager has completed initialization at least once, false if not

      • addDevice

        public boolean addDevice(AylaDevice device)
        Adds a device to the device manager. This should only be called internally after a device has been registered to the account.
        参数:
        device - Device that was just registered
        返回:
        true if the device was added, false if it already exists or an error occurred

      • deviceServiceUrl

        public java.lang.String deviceServiceUrl(java.lang.String path)
        Returns a URL for the Device service pointing to the specified path. This URL will vary depending on the AylaSystemSettings provided to the CoreManager during initialization.
        参数:
        path - Path of the URL to be returned, e.g. "users/sign_in.json"
        返回:
        Full URL, e.g. "https://ads-field.aylanetworks.com/apiv1/users/sign_in.json"

      • sendDeviceServiceRequest

        public AylaAPIRequest sendDeviceServiceRequest(AylaAPIRequest request)
        Enqueues the provided request to the Ayla Cloud Device Service.
        参数:
        request - the request to send
        返回:
        the request, which can be used for cancellation.

      • getAylaRegistration

        public AylaRegistration getAylaRegistration()

      • createDatapointBatch

        public AylaAPIRequest createDatapointBatch(AylaDatapointBatchRequest[] requests,
                                           com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaDatapointBatchResponse[]> successListener,
                                           ErrorListener errorListener)
        Create a Batch of AylaDatapoint objects. Each item in the array of requests may be for any device or property of that device, allowing many properties across multiple devices to be updated simultaneously.

        The caller should call AylaDatapointBatchResponse.getStatus() on each element returned in the response array for a good (200-level) status code indicating the datapoint was created successfully. Datapoints with responses in this array that have non-200-level status codes were not created.

        The errorListener will be called if the service could not be reached or returned an error from the batch request. The successListener will be called if the batch operation itself was successful, even if some of the datapoints were not created.

        参数:
        requests - An array of AylaDatapointBatchRequest objects
        successListener - An array of AylaDatapointBatchResponse objects
        errorListener - Listener to receive an AylaError should one occur
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest object used to create a Datapoint Batch

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice(AylaDevice device)
        Internal method called when a device is unregistered. Listeners will be notified that the device list has changed.
        参数:
        device - Device that was unregistered

      • connectivityChanged

        public void connectivityChanged(boolean wifiEnabled,
                                boolean cellularEnabled)
        指定者:
        connectivityChanged 在接口中 AylaConnectivity.AylaConnectivityListener

      • isCachedDeviceList

        public boolean isCachedDeviceList()
        返回:
        True if the current device list is a cached list, and might be stale

      • setIsCachedDeviceList

        public void setIsCachedDeviceList(boolean _isCachedDeviceList)
        Set whether the device list is cached. This is set during offline use of the app.
        参数:
        _isCachedDeviceList - true if device list is cached.

      • fetchAlertHistory

        public AylaAPIRequest fetchAlertHistory(java.lang.String dsn,
                                        com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAlertHistory[]> successListener,
                                        ErrorListener errorListener,
                                        boolean paginated,
                                        int perPage,
                                        int page,
                                        AylaAlertHistory.AlertFilter alertFilter,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sortParams)
        Fetch list of alerts sent to the user for this device.
        参数:
        dsn - DSN of the device for which the alert history is to be fetched. The device must be currently registered to this user.
        successListener - Listener to receive an array of AylaAlertHistory objects on success.
        errorListener - Listener to receive errors should an error occur.
        paginated - true if paginated. false otherwise.
        perPage - Number of entries per page. This will be ignored if paginated is false.
        page - Page number to request. This will be ignored if paginated is false.
        alertFilter - Filter to apply to the result. (Optional). An AylaAlertHistory.AlertFilter object passed to this request will apply the filter set in the object to the result from this method. Refer AlertFilter#add(AlertHistoryFilters, FilterOperators, String) to add filters.
        sortParams - Map with key-value specifying sorting orders for results returned from the API. For default order, use null value for this parameter. To sort by a field, use key "order_by" and value as field name. eg: To get results in descending order of sent_at field, use map "order_by": "sent_at", "order": "desc" And to get results in ascending order of sent_at field, use map "order_by": "sent_at", "order": "asc".

      • setLanModePermitted

        public void setLanModePermitted(boolean permitted)
        Enables or disables LAN mode on all devices owned by this user.
        参数:
        permitted - true to enable LAN mode on all devices, false to disable.
